Key Arguments: The legislation represents a significant overreach by the government into the lives of Australian citizens.
Individuals should have the freedom to determine what constitutes misinformation or disinformation by accessing diverse sources of information.
Restricting information to one perspective is a step towards tyranny.
The author has personal experience living near a country with oppressive government control, which negatively impacted free speech and personal freedoms.

By shutting down a huge part of information and only feed the people one side of a story, is just the beginning of the start of true tyranny.
